title: Pixel XL just rebooted on its own, restated slowly was normal for a min and then just shut down.
content: Pixel XL just rebooted on its own, restarted slowly was normal for a min and then just shut down. Had 86% power. Cannot get it to restart. Screen is just black with absolutely no response. just had Pandora running and tried to get into Facebook when it crashed for the final time. Thoughts ?
